entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Prévost
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -11.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Mirabel Int'l Airport 07:56 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -11.5°C

Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 85 %

Dewpoint: -13.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
